name: Innovative Learning Kft
description: Developer of an online training platform designed to teach secure software building using hands-on IT security exercises and tutorials. The company's platform covers topics like web security, secure coding in Java, C/C++, incident response, threat analysis, secure API design as well and DevSecOps and offers a library of IT security exercises, enabling users to increase security awareness, enrich existing IT security training and allow self-directed learning, for continuous professional development.
